title: Bare land for long term lease
details:
I am having a bare land in Kottawa which faces the Kottawa -Malabe main road. (Which is going to be a 4 lane road under the project of megapolis within this year - 3K project megapolis)

Land is next to Sirimalwaththa junction and it will be ideal place to have a warehouse or a factory (super market) because it’s 5 minutes drive from land to Kottawa highway entrance.

The land extent is 10 Acres and I have a separated land very close to the main land which is 1 and 1/2 acres..

I am willing to lease out the lands for long term lease and if you all are interested. Please let me know.
